Package controller

Class addPartFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.addPartFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class addPartFormController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller/manipulator of the AddPartForm.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    addPartFormController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
    This method overrides from javafx.fxml.Initializable.
    void onActionCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method returns the user to the main menu.
    void onActionSave​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method will add a new part to the allParts list in Inventory if the proper conditions are met by the entries in the text fields.
    void onActionSwitchInHouse​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method changes the text of the label machIDCompanyNameLbl to machineId when inHouse is selected.
    void onActionSwitchOutsourced​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method changes the text of the label machIDCompanyNameLbl to Company Name when the outsourced button is selected.

  • Method Details

    • onActionCancel

      public void onActionCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This method returns the user to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the cancel button is pressed on the AddPartForm in the GUI.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be read.

    • onActionSwitchInHouse

      public void onActionSwitchInHouse​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method changes the text of the label machIDCompanyNameLbl to machineId when inHouse is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the radio button inHouse is selected/clicked.

    • onActionSwitchOutsourced

      public void onActionSwitchOutsourced​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method changes the text of the label machIDCompanyNameLbl to Company Name when the outsourced button is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the radio button outSourced is selected/clicked.

    • onActionSave

      public void onActionSave​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This method will add a new part to the allParts list in Inventory if the proper conditions are met by the entries in the text fields.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the save button is clicked.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be read.

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
      This method overrides from javafx.fxml.Initializable.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The url
      rb - The resource bundle
